userStories.title: GitHub Releases 版本获取服务

acceptanceCriteria: 创建 API 服务获取 GitHub Releases 最新版本

Typecheck passes
userStories.notes: Completed: GitHubReleaseService created with caching, GET /api/v1/system/app-versions endpoint

userStories.title: 实现明暗主题切换

acceptanceCriteria: 默认跟随系统主题设置
